attributes.action: Allow UK nationals to sponsor Ukrainian refugees
attributes.additional_details: Because it is a moral and humanitarian imperative under the present circumstances when Ukrainians are fleeing in time of war, and the people of Britain and the Uk want to provide practical and immediate help and call on the UK Government to provide immediate assistance to make this possible.
attributes.background: Allow Ukrainian refugees to enter the country under relaxed visa requirements, even without immediate family or extended family connections in the UK, provided individual UK citizens and nationals are prepared to sponsor their entry.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Implement arrangements to enable English households to sponsor Ukraine refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610542
